name: Saladian
description:
Cross-platform bullet hell space game made in Unity.

This project started as mobile course project for Tampere University of Applied Sciences.

Platforms (Download)

  • Android
    • Google Play
    • .apk
  • Windows
    • 32 bit
    • 64 bit
  • GNU/Linux
  • WebGL
  • iOS
    • You need to build it yourself.
  • OS X/macOS
    • You need to build it yourself.

Source code for version 1.0

  • zip
  • tar.gz

Music

By Visager at Free Music Achive

  • Menu music
  • Game music
